dict.string: SoundScape needs access to your location so you can pin the sound location on the map and share geotagged audio with other users.
SoundScape needs access to save images to your photo library.
SoundScape needs access to your photo library so you can select and change your profile picture.
SoundScape needs access to your microphone so you can record audio and share it with other users on SoundScape.
SoundScape needs access to your document folder so you can select audio files and share them with other users on SoundScape.
